title: In the Eye of the Storm
description: The Saga of THE CALLAHANS continues...Beau Callahan has spent a good portion of his life playing baseball for millions of adoring fans. When the limelight finally gets to him, he decides to visit his brother and sister-in-law in Riverdale, Montana. With nothing in mind but a little R&R, the last thing Beau is looking for is a female entanglement...which is exactly what he gets when he literally runs into Kate Nyland.Kate Nyland is through with men. She's had enough bad dates, miserable relationships and heartache to last her a lifetime. When she meets Beau Callahan, she immediately pegs him as an egotistical, superstar jock...until she realizes there is far more to him than meets the eye. Sparks quickly fly between Kate and Beau. While they struggle to come to terms with their undeniable attraction, danger lurks in the shadows. A stalker has been following Beau's every move for the past two years, and soon this psycho's obsession switches from Beau to Kate. With both of their lives on the line, they struggle to find their way out of the storm of terror that surrounds them.Contains Alternate Cover
author: Jennifer  Hayden
